title: Banking and Investments
keywords: Including: commercial banking, consumer finance, asset management, investment banking, trading, exchanges, private equity, venture capital, etc.

solutions.impact: Decrease of provisions for liabilities and charges through more precise risk assessment
solutions.description: Banks can predict the Probability of Default (PD) and Exposure at Default (EAD) more precisely by using Machine Learning models compared to traditional score cards. By modern techniques, explainability of such models is also possible to ensure auditability by regulators.

solutions.impact: Cost reduction for call center operations
solutions.description: Banks can automatically route customers to the best service personnel available massively reducing costs in the call center and time by customer spent on service calls.

solutions.impact: Cost reduction through faster business processes
solutions.description: Banks can identify potential issues in their business processes through process mining. Using these insights, business processes can be optimized to save costs.

solutions.impact: Revenue increase through extended customer relationships
solutions.description: Banks can identify likely churners and identify offers that will convince them to stay.

solutions.impact: Revenue increase through improved customer relationships
solutions.description: Banks can improve their customer understanding in order to adjust tactical and strategic decisions towards their customers' needs.

solutions.impact: Revenue increase through improved store locations
solutions.description: Banks gain transparency on their branches and different types of branches and which services customers use to derive a specific strategy for each location.

solutions.impact: Revenues through upselling due to more relevant promotions
solutions.description: Banks can make offers to customers based on their needs. By understanding which promotions are meaningful for a specific customer, retailers can move away from mass communication to personalized interactions with their customers.

solutions.impact: Revenue increase through improved store footprint
solutions.description: Banks can find the ideal location for their next branch or decide which branches to close or merge.

solutions.impact: Cost reduction through improved AML processes
solutions.description: Banks can automatically identify cases of money laundering (shell companies, money mules, etc.) from their transaction data. These insights can be used to optimize the AML process and reduce manual investigations into potential cases of money laundering.
